title: Zeolite-Like Ion-Exchanged Cu-Attapulgite Catalysts for Promoted Selective Oxidation of Ammonia
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00157E, Paper
Xuebin Zhang, Tianwei Lan, Qiuying Yi, Yufei Wang, Danhong Cheng, Dengsong Zhang
The selective catalytic oxidation of ammonia (NH3-SCO) to N2 and H2O is a highly efficient method for eliminating NH3 pollution. However, it is still a challenge to develop low-cost and...
